name: Move your Hams
description:
Move your Hams is a rythm game where you must follow the music and dance correctly in order to draw the attention of the farmer and help your pigs friends to escape!

Developer Team

Game Designer

 Javier Cervilla

3D artists

 Paula Martín

Nicolás Caparrós

Programmer

Alejandro Ortiz

This game has been made with the following assets:

-Cartoon FX - Jean Moreno

-Free Disco Music - Kevin MacLeod

-Free Skybox - Render Knight
